select teacher.real_name as teacherName, course_detail.course_number, course.name as courseName, course.type, course.period, course.credit, course_detail.semester, grade.regular_scores, grade.exam_scores, 0.6 * grade.regular_scores + 0.4 * grade.exam_scores as finalScores
from student left join student_course_detail on student.number = student_course_detail.student_number left join course_detail on student_course_detail.course_detail_id = course_detail.id left join course on course_detail.course_number = course.number left join teacher on course_detail.teacher_number = teacher.number left join grade on student_course_detail.course_detail_id = grade.course_detail_id

select grade.id as gradeId, grade.submitted, specialty.name as specialtyName, grade.student_number, student.real_name as studentName, grade.course_detail_id, course_detail.course_number, course.name as courseName, course.type, course.period, course.credit, course_detail.semester, grade.regular_scores, grade.exam_scores, 0.6 * grade.regular_scores + 0.4 * grade.exam_scores as finalScores from student left join grade on student.number = student_number left join specialty on student.specialty_number = specialty.number left join course_detail on grade.course_detail_id = course_detail.id left join course on course_detail.course_number = course.number
